meanings.definition: A person or thing that brings something into existence.
meanings.sent1: The creator of the painting used vibrant colors to make it come to life.
meanings.sent2: The artist is the creator of this beautiful sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The creator of the new recipe accidentally added too much salt, creating a salty disaster.
meanings.sent4: Nature is the ultimate creator, painting the sky with breathtaking sunsets.
meanings.sent5: The creator of the magical world in the book made readers feel like they were part of the adventure.

meanings.definition: Someone who invents or produces something.
meanings.sent1: The creator of the first computer revolutionized the way we communicate.
meanings.sent2: Thomas Edison is known as a prolific creator of innovative inventions.
meanings.sent3: The creator of the new toy design had kids jumping with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination was the creator of fantastical stories that captivated audiences.
meanings.sent5: The creator of the popular video game series continues to surprise players with new levels of excitement.
